projectOfTheWeek.title: Hand Gesture-Based Volume Control System
projectOfTheWeek.description: This project enables users to control their system volume using just hand gestures detected through a webcam. By measuring the distance between the thumb and index finger using MediaPipe's hand landmarks, the system adjusts the volume in real-time. It's an intuitive and touch-free way to manage audio levels using computer vision and hand tracking.

recentProjects.title: ByteCode - Online Code Compiler
recentProjects.description: A  full-stack online code compiler that supports Python, C++, and Java, enabling users to write, compile, and execute code directly from their browsers.
